thread.title: John McCain's mom celebrates 105th birthday - Washington Examiner
thread.title_full: John McCain's mom celebrates 105th birthday - Washington Examiner

title: John McCain's mom celebrates 105th birthday - Washington Examiner
text:
The Republican senator shared a montage of photos of his mother. (AP Photo/Charles Dharapak) John McCain's mom celebrates 105th birthday By Caitlin Yilek ( @hausofcait ) • 2/7/17 5:25 PM Caitlin Yilek The Washington Examiner http://s3.amazonaws.com/content.washingtonexaminer.biz/images/static/authors/headshotCAITLIN_YILEK.jpg 
Republican Sen. John McCain wished his "wonderful" mother, Roberta, a happy 105th birthday Tuesday with a montage of photos on Twitter. 
"We love you mom!" the Arizona senator tweeted. Happy 105th birthday to my wonderful mother Roberta - we love you mom! pic.twitter.com/63E912Imub — John McCain (@SenJohnMcCain) February 7, 2017 
McCain's wife, Cindy, and daughter, Meghan, also tweeted birthday wishes. 
Stay abreast of the latest developments from nation's capital and beyond with curated News Alerts from the Washington Examiner news desk and delivered to your inbox. Sorry, there was a problem processing your email signup. Please try again later. Processing... Thank you for signing up for Washington Examiner News Alerts. You should receive your first alert soon! 
"You are an inspiration to me and so many others every day," Meghan McCain wrote. Happy 105th Birthday to my incredible Nana (Roberta) McCain! You are an inspiration to me and so many others every day. pic.twitter.com/lzHKx8MKmo — Meghan McCain (@MeghanMcCain) February 7, 2017 Happy 105th Birthday Roberta McCain! https://t.co/lJ6rxxoDxX — Cindy McCain (@cindymccain) February 7, 2017 
Roberta McCain was born Feb. 12, 1912, in Oklahoma. Top Story
